summary.para: Contains information on a footer item.

remarks.para: This structure is used with the macro and the LVM_GETFOOTERITEM message.

summary.para: Set of flags that specify which members of this structure contain data to be set or which members are being requested. This parameter must be one of the following values:

description.para: The pszText member is valid input from the caller or is requested and thus should be set by the receiver.
The state member is valid input from the caller or is requested and thus should be set by the receiver.

summary.para: A pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode buffer. The calling process is responsible for allocating the buffer.
The number of WCHARs in the buffer pointed to by pszText, including the terminating NULL.
Indicates the item's state. The stateMask member indicates the valid bits of this member. Currently, state must be set to the following:

description.para: Bit indicating focus state. Set if the item is in focus, otherwise cleared.

summary.para: Value specifying which bits of the state member will be retrieved or modified. Currently, this value must be the following:

description.para: The LVFIS_FOCUSED bit of member state is valid. For example, setting this member to LVFIS_FOCUSED will cause the focus state to be retrieved to member state.
